alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, southwestern Camden, south central Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homeland, or over Folkston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Woodbine, Homeland, Winokur, Tarboro and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
